ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters Spell Components
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, I have located two words for Enchanters.  They are currently in my bank and I shall attempt to sell them soon for approx. 4pp each. Valacian - 20th Level
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, I have located two words for Enchanters. They are currently in my bank and I shall attempt to sell them soon for approx. 4pp each.

Valacian - 20th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: duffjc@... [SMTP:duffjc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:47 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Enchanters Spell Components

From: duffjc@...

Just wondering. I have heard about runes for Wizards but, has anyone ever come across any words that are components for Enchanters in their travels? This is in response to Chad Eldrige's post about Spell components.

Where do you find these words?

Duff
Intrests in all forms of the Arcane
